snippet: Wegelin & Company, the oldest Swiss bank, has confirmed that three of its employees have been indicted on charges of helping United States taxpayers hide more than $1.2 billion from the Internal Revenue Service.
abstract: Wegelin & Company, the oldest Swiss bank, has confirmed that three of its employees have been indicted on charges of helping United States taxpayers hide more than $1.2 billion from the Internal Revenue Service.

headline.main: U.S. Charges 3 Swiss Bank Employees With Aiding Tax Evasion
